split

public static  split(java.util.List<java.io.File> img,
                          double perc1)
Split a list of images. Used to generate experiments database.

Parameters:
img - List of images.
perc1 - [0.0,1.0] The first list has perc1 of the images. The second list has (1-perc1) of the images.
Returns:
Return a pair containing the two lists.
